text: Chasing Yesterday may refer to: * Chasing Yesterday (album), a 2015 album by Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds ** Chasing Yesterday Tour, a tour by Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds * Chasing Yesterday (books), a series of books by Robin Wasserman * Chasing Yesterday (film), a 1935 historical drama film directed by George Nicholls Jr.
title: Chasing Yesterday
